original_text: She is more precious than rubies: and all the things thou canst desire are not to be compared unto her.
korean_text: 지혜는 진주보다 귀하니 네가 사모하는 모든 것으로도 이에 비교할 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: She is more precious than rubies
and all the things thou canst desire
are not to be compared unto her
